full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement 
### RFI for Renewal of Advertising Creative Services Standing Offers

#### Announcement Details

* Announcement Number: `WS3679791031`
* Publication Date: `2022-10-05`
* Closing Date: `2022-11-30T14:00:00`
* Expected Contract Start Date: `2023-07-01`
* Expected Contract End Date: `2028-07-31`

This solicitation announcement pertains to the renewal of Standing Offers for Advertising Creative Services. The proposed contract includes multiple streams, focusing on advertising creative services targeting specific audiences, such as racialized communities, LGBTQ2+ communities, and Indigenous communities.

#### Solicitation Information

* Procedure: Competitive - Open bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

The bidding process will follow the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) trade agreement. Interested parties are encouraged to review the associated draft Statement of Work (SOW) and proposed evaluation criteria.

#### Tender Description

The purpose of this RFI is to seek input from interested parties regarding the development of new Requests for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Advertising Creative Services. The Government of Canada aims to identify potential barriers to participation and encourage the involvement of firms that have not previously participated in these procurement processes.

#### Contact Information

* Christopher (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: `christopher.ivany@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca`
	+ Note: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be made by `2022-11-30T14:00:00`.

#### Relevant Documents

* Associated draft Statement of Work (SOW): Annex “A” section 13
* Proposed evaluation criteria: Annex “F” - section 14

#### Region of Delivery

The tender covers services across Canada. Interested parties are required to submit their bids and supporting documentation in the English or French language. The Government of Canada reserves the right to request translation and assess bids based on this characteristic.
